Functions
misc_fnc_getRoadWidth

Measures the width of a road object with given precision

Parameters: _road, _precision, _maxWidth

_road

road object

_precision

the precision with which to find the width

_maxWidth

the maximum width. If the road is wider, the return value will max at _maxWidth

return value: number, road width or 0 if wrong road object was given

Author: Sparker Date: 16.08.2017
